title: EYL#198 Former Inmate Turned Luxury Brand CEO
itunes:title: EYL#198 Former Inmate Turned Luxury Brand CEO
description:
For episode 198, we spoke to Darrell Alston, the CEO, and founder of Bungee Brand. Bungee Brand is a high-end sneaker and apparel line. Darrell will make history this fall by being the first 100% black-owned sneaker brand to be in Neiman Marcus. In EYL 198, Darrell tells us his inspiring story of beating the odds and incarceration, to becoming an entrepreneur and starting a clothing brand. He spoke about why he focused on the high-end market and provided insight into the challenges of getting up and running. #luxury #sneakers SAVE $50 on your next purchase. Use coupon code EYL https://bungeebrand.com EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com Link for Invest Fest Europe: https://investfest.com/euro/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
